channel.title: Install errors and no launcher menus
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm trying to install the whonix-qubes binary package (10, v3.0.2) but the process leaves me with no launcher entries for whonix gateway and a list of errors[1]. This is on Qubes R2 that has been updated with the testing repos.
The last time I tried Whonix-Qubes it installed and worked pretty smoothly, but it was prior to release 10.
What can I do to get this working?
[code]1. Running transaction (shutdown inhibited) Installing : qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental-3.0.2-201505180340.noarch 1/1 --> Processing the root.img... (this might take a while) --> Processing the volatile.img... --> Creating private.img... --> Instaling menu shortcuts... --> Cleaning volatile image: /var/lib/qubes/vm-templates/whonix-gw-experimental/volatile.img... --> Loading the VM (type = TemplateVM)... --> Setting Xen Store info for the VM... --> Updating firewall rules... --> Starting the VM... --> Starting the qrexec daemon... Waiting for VM's qrexec agent.....connected Warning: ignoring key 'Comment' of gateway-reloadtor.desktop Warning: ignoring key 'Comment' of gateway-reloadfirewall.desktop Warning: ignoring key 'Comment' of gateway-stoptor.desktop Warning: ignoring key 'Comment' of gateway-restarttor.desktop ----> Failed to get icon for qtconfig-qt4.desktop: Image format violation ----> Failed to get icon for gateway-firewall30default.desktop: Image size constraint violation: width=720 height=720 max_width=512 max_height=512 ----> Failed to get icon for krandrtray.desktop: Image format violation ----> Failed to get icon for mutt.desktop: Image format violation ----> Failed to get icon for debian-xterm.desktop: Image format violation ----> Failed to get icon for debian-uxterm.desktop: Image format violation Shutting down VM: 'whonix-gw-experimental'... Waiting for the VM(s) to shutdown... Waiting for VMs: ['whonix-gw-experimental'] Waiting for VMs: ['whonix-gw-experimental'] Verifying : qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental-3.0.2-201505180340.noarch 1/1
Installed: qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental.noarch 0:3.0.2-201505180340
Complete! [/code]

item.title: Install errors and no launcher menus
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Install errors and no launcher menus

item.title: Install errors and no launcher menus
item.dc:creator: cprise
item.description:
Its showing up in Qubes Manager and will run, but there is no trace of it in the ‘Start’ menu (the KDE Launcher).

I wasn’t sure which forum was appropriate for Whonix-Qubes issues. I’ll try the mailing list as you suggested.

Read full topic
item.source: Install errors and no launcher menus

item.title: Install errors and no launcher menus
item.dc:creator: nrgaway
item.description:
The installation seems to have completed. I ofter get those type of errors when installing templates.

Do you mean its not showing up in ques-manager or ‘Start’ menu?

Either way, maybe post on qubes mailing list since Marek may have an answer.

Read full topic
item.source: Install errors and no launcher menus

item.title: Install errors and no launcher menus
item.dc:creator: cprise
item.description:
Hello,

I’m trying to install the whonix-qubes binary package (10, v3.0.2) but the process leaves me with no launcher entries for whonix gateway and a list of errors[1]. This is on Qubes R2 that has been updated with the testing repos.

The last time I tried Whonix-Qubes it installed and worked pretty smoothly, but it was prior to release 10.

What can I do to get this working?

[code]1.
Running transaction (shutdown inhibited)
Installing : qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental-3.0.2-201505180340.noarch 1/1
–> Processing the root.img… (this might take a while)
–> Processing the volatile.img…
–> Creating private.img…
–> Instaling menu shortcuts…
–> Cleaning volatile image: /var/lib/qubes/vm-templates/whonix-gw-experimental/volatile.img…
–> Loading the VM (type = TemplateVM)…
–> Setting Xen Store info for the VM…
–> Updating firewall rules…
–> Starting the VM…
–> Starting the qrexec daemon…
Waiting for VM’s qrexec agent…connected
Warning: ignoring key ‘Comment’ of gateway-reloadtor.desktop
Warning: ignoring key ‘Comment’ of gateway-reloadfirewall.desktop
Warning: ignoring key ‘Comment’ of gateway-stoptor.desktop
Warning: ignoring key ‘Comment’ of gateway-restarttor.desktop
----> Failed to get icon for qtconfig-qt4.desktop: Image format violation
----> Failed to get icon for gateway-firewall30default.desktop: Image size constraint violation: width=720 height=720 max_width=512 max_height=512
----> Failed to get icon for krandrtray.desktop: Image format violation
----> Failed to get icon for mutt.desktop: Image format violation
----> Failed to get icon for debian-xterm.desktop: Image format violation
----> Failed to get icon for debian-uxterm.desktop: Image format violation
Shutting down VM: ‘whonix-gw-experimental’…
Waiting for the VM(s) to shutdown…
Waiting for VMs: [‘whonix-gw-experimental’]
Waiting for VMs: [‘whonix-gw-experimental’]
Verifying : qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental-3.0.2-201505180340.noarch 1/1

Installed:
qubes-template-whonix-gw-experimental.noarch 0:3.0.2-201505180340

Complete!
[/code]
